message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our premium product, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500. This is a great deal, considering its value and quality.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value and quality of your product. However, I was hoping to keep my budget around $8000. Would it be possible to negotiate further?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9000. This is a fair price considering its value and quality, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
